        public final double getDistance(GeoPoint from)
        Returns the distance to the incident location from the specified point.
        Parameters:
        from - The point to calculate the distance from
        Returns:

      • getBearingAngle

        public final double getBearingAngle(Location userLocation,
                     double currentHeading)
        Gets the bearing from the specified location and heading to the incident.
        Parameters:
        userLocation - The user's location.
        currentHeading - The user's current heading.
        Returns:
        The bearing that points directly to the incident.
